background_dashed.customLabel: In School-age (6-12 years old),  participants, there is no difference between SECRET and controls on Restricted/repetitive behaviors. Based on the analysis of the quality of the evidence produced by the 4 clinical trials exploring this effect, we have a very low confidence in the estimation of this effect.

In School-age (6-12 years old),  participants, there is no difference between SECRET and controls on Disruptive behaviors. Based on the analysis of the quality of the evidence produced by the 3 clinical trials exploring this effect, we have a very low confidence in the estimation of this effect.
